text:
I THOROUGHLY enjoyed your class.
            It was very well taught and the material
            was very well organized for maximum learning!

Dave has a unique ability to provide a
            third-party view of each software vendor's
            product. The well thought-out exercises,
            combined with the flexibility to address
            specific issues brought up by students made
            this class well worth my while.

Great people skills; relates to students and recognizes when people
            are fading out.

A GREAT, EFFECTIVE instructor. He cut through
            the bull of all the Buzz words!

Very Well prepared. The Instructors high energy level
            maintains student interest.

Our instructor was knowledgeable, entertaining,
            extremely clear at explaining things. I hope we hire him
            for any other training that we do.

The format of the class is conducive to the way in which I learn.
            I felt that by the end of the class, I could get around the class
            libraries and learn on my on effectively.

The instructor was obviously experienced and well versed in the subject material. This class was one of the
            best courses I have attended

Our Instructor did an excellent job at
            managing the pace of the class and explaining
            key concepts. He came across as knowledgeable
            and sincere, and kept up the level of interest
            throughout the week.

The great use of the big picture overviews
            going to more specifics. The instructor has great
            upbeat positive presentation skills.
            Very patient. The subject matter was very interesting
            and I could not believe that the sessions were over
            as quickly as they were

I found your instruction and presentation of the material to be excellent,
            and have recommended your classes to other colleagues.

Hands on presentation with knowledgeable instructor.
            Clear and easy to understand presentation.
            Great class.
